SEARCH
Module sc2002OOP
Package sc2002OOP.obj

Class User

java.lang.Object
sc2002OOP.obj.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CareerCenterStaff, CompanyRepresentative, Student
public abstract class User extends Object implements Serializable

User Base Class

This is the abstract base class for all user roles within the IPMS (students, company representatives, and career center staff). It contains all the core user functions, such as login/logout authentication, viewing/filtering internships, and viewing common profile details.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kee Kai Wen, Kelvin Tay Wei Jie, Koay Jun Zhi, Lim Jia Wei Jerald, Teo Kai Jie
See Also:
  • CareerCenterStaff
  • CompanyRepresentative
  • Student

    User(String userID, String name, String email, String password)
    Constructs a User object with all mandatory authentication fields.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Default constructor.

    • User

      public User(String userID, String name, String email, String password)
      Constructs a User object with all mandatory authentication fields. The password should be stored as a securely hashed value. * @param userID The unique identifier for the user.
      Parameters:
      name - The user's full name.
      email - The user's email address.
      password - The user's hashed password.

    • User

      public User(String userID, String name, String email)
      Constructs a partial User object, typically used during registration before a password is set, or for users whose password is managed externally (Note: not generally used in final system logic). * @param userID The unique identifier for the user.
      Parameters:
      name - The user's full name.
      email - The user's email address.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static User login(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> users)
      Handles the static authentication process for any user logging into the system. This method iterates through all available user accounts, verifies the User ID, and securely checks the entered password against the stored hash. * @param sc The Scanner object used to capture User ID and password input.
      Parameters:
      users - An ArrayList containing all registered user accounts (Students, Staff, Reps).
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object if login is successful, or null if authentication fails or if a Company Representative is pending/rejected.

    • changePassword

      public abstract void changePassword(Scanner sc)
      Abstract method enforced on all subclasses to handle the user-specific logic for securely changing their password.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object for input.

    • displayHome

      public abstract void displayHome(Scanner sc)
      Abstract method enforced on all subclasses to display the role-specific main menu and handle navigation for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object for input.

    • viewProfile

      public abstract void viewProfile(Scanner sc)
      Abstract method enforced on all subclasses to display the user's personal profile details.
      Parameters:

    • viewInternshipOpps

      public abstract void viewInternshipOpps(Scanner sc)
      Abstract method enforced on all subclasses to view and filter internship opportunities, with potential differences in filtering criteria or visibility based on the user's role.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object for input.
